quote: Gratitude makes sense of our past, brings peace for today, and creates a vision for tomorrow.
name: Melody Beattie

quote: Feeling gratitude and not expressing it is like wrapping a present and not giving it.
name: William Arthur Ward

quote: When you practice gratefulness, there is a sense of respect toward others.
name: Dalai Lama

quote: When I started counting my blessings, my whole life turned around.
name: Willie Nelson

quote: I have a lot to be thankful for. I am healthy, happy and I am loved.
name: Reba McEntire

quote: If the only prayer you ever say in your entire life is thank you, it will be enough.
name: Meister Eckhart

quote: Thank you for life, and all the little ups and downs that make it worth living.
name: Travis Barker

quote: I'm thankful for every moment.
name: Al Green

quote: Joy is the simplest form of gratitude.
name: Karl Barth

quote: I am even thankful for the negative things that have made me a stronger and better person.
name: Joanna Krupa

quote: Be thankful we're not getting all the government we're paying for.
name: Will Rogers

quote: I'm very blessed, thankful, grateful for the opportunities I've had.
name: Christen Press

quote: Gratitude is the sign of noble souls.
name: Aesop

quote: Let us be grateful to the mirror for revealing to us our appearance only.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: Gratitude is not only the greatest of virtues, but the parent of all the others.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Gratitude is the fairest blossom which springs from the soul.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: I think, every time I'm on the mountain, I'm just so thankful to be there.
name: Chloe Kim

quote: When you are grateful - when you can see what you have - you unlock blessings to flow in your life.
name: Suze Orman

quote: Some people are always grumbling because roses have thorns; I am thankful that thorns have roses.
name: Alphonse Karr

quote: I think in this life it's important to be kind, be thankful, and always be creative.
name: Bishop Briggs

quote: The thankful receiver bears a plentiful harvest.
name: William Blake

quote: I'm just thankful I'm surrounded by good people.
name: Jon Pardi

quote: There's no happier person than a truly thankful, content person.
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: Gratitude changes the pangs of memory into a tranquil joy.
name: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quote: I'm thankful because all the hard work and sacrifices were worth it in the end.
name: WizKid

quote: If you suffer, thank God! It is a sure sign that you are alive.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: I'm grateful for always this moment, the now, no matter what form it takes.
name: Eckhart Tolle

quote: I am very thankful and blessed to have a healthy and happy baby boy and baby mama.
name: Eric Church

quote: Talent is God-given; be humble. Fame is man-given; be thankful. Conceit is self-given; be careful.
name: Harvey Mackay

quote: No duty is more urgent than that of returning thanks.
name: James Allen

quote: When a person doesn't have gratitude, something is missing in his or her humanity.
name: Elie Wiesel

quote: I am thankful for laughter, except when milk comes out of my nose.
name: Woody Allen

quote: My advice: Take a second out of the day today and be thankful for your family.
name: Jenna Morasca

quote: Immensely grateful, touched, proud, astonished, abashed.
name: Boris Pasternak

quote: Be thankful for problems. If they were less difficult, someone with less ability might have your job.
name: Jim Lovell

quote: If you are really thankful, what do you do? You share.
name: W. Clement Stone

quote: Dear Lord, I'm so grateful I'm still loved.
name: Vivien Leigh

quote: When it comes to life the critical thing is whether you take things for granted or take them with gratitude.
name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: The trick is to be grateful when your mood is high and graceful when it is low.
name: Richard Carlson

quote: I wouldn't change anything. I've made mistakes, but thanks to those mistakes, I've learned.
name: Enrique Iglesias

quote: Strive to find things to be thankful for, and just look for the good in who you are!
name: Bethany Hamilton

quote: Whatever life throws at me I'll take it and be grateful for it as well.
name: Tom Felton

quote: Keep your eyes open to your mercies. The man who forgets to be thankful has fallen asleep in life.
name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: The hardest arithmetic to master is that which enables us to count our blessings.
name: Eric Hoffer

quote: A single grateful thought toward heaven is the most perfect prayer.
name: Gotthold Ephraim Lessing

quote: If a fellow isn't thankful for what he's got, he isn't likely to be thankful for what he's going to get.
name: Frank A. Clark

quote: God has two dwellings; one in heaven, and the other in a meek and thankful heart.
name: Izaak Walton

quote: Gratitude is the most exquisite form of courtesy.
name: Jacques Maritain

quote: I'm thankful to God that my life changed, but I'm also still on my grind.
name: Tory Lanez

quote: I'm thankful for each and every day. We never know when time is up.
name: Chuck Berry

quote: Feeling gratitude isn't born in us - it's something we are taught, and in turn, we teach our children.
name: Joyce Brothers

quote: I do not so much rejoice that God hath made me to be a Queen, as to be a Queen over so thankful a people.
name: Elizabeth I

quote: A proud man is seldom a grateful man, for he never thinks he gets as much as he deserves.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: If I can do one hundredth part for the Indian that Mrs. Stowe did for the Negro, I will be thankful.
name: Helen Hunt Jackson

quote: Does not the gratitude of the dog put to shame any man who is ungrateful to his benefactors?
name: Saint Basil

quote: I want to be as gracious and thankful as I can because it has been a long road.
name: Maren Morris

quote: We are in a wrong state of mind if we are not in a thankful state of mind.
name: Charles Spurgeon

quote: Sometimes we need to remind ourselves that thankfulness is indeed a virtue.
name: William Bennett

quote: For what I have received may the Lord make me truly thankful. And more truly for what I have not received.
name: Storm Jameson

quote: I'm thankful to be breathing, on this side of the grass. Whatever comes, comes.
name: Ron Perlman

quote: Never take anything for granted.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: I am really thankful to everyone around, as Mumbai has given me a lot.
name: Kratika Sengar

quote: Gratitude is a duty which ought to be paid, but which none have a right to expect.
name: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: Many of our prayers were not answered, and for this we are now grateful.
name: William Feather

quote: I'm thankful I grew up the way I did. It made me a hard worker and insightful to other people's lives.
name: Rachel Roy

quote: Most people repent their sins by thanking God they ain't so wicked as their neighbors.
name: Josh Billings

quote: I have so much to be thankful for.
name: Alyssa Edwards

quote: I am what I am, I'm doing very well in my life, and I'm thankful to God for that.
name: LL Cool J

quote: I'm from Canada, so Thanksgiving to me is just Thursday with more food. And I'm thankful for that.
name: Howie Mandel

quote: I have nothing to ask for, thanks to God. Everything I have, God has given me.
name: Mariano Rivera

quote: I'm so happy and thankful I made it a point be a stay-at-home mom.
name: Candace Cameron Bure

quote: I'm thankful for serendipitous moments in my life, where things could've gone the other way.
name: Rick Springfield

quote: I'm just very thankful. And I say that a lot because that's the most important message.
name: Pharrell Williams

quote: Old age is not a matter for sorrow. It is matter for thanks if we have left our work done behind us.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: I'm thankful for weird people out there 'cause they're some of the most creative people.
name: Channing Tatum

quote: Before I get out of bed, I am saying thank you. I know how important it is to be thankful.
name: Al Jarreau

quote: All our discontents about what we want appeared to spring from the want of thankfulness for what we have.
name: Daniel Defoe

quote: I'm very thankful that I can make people happy just by signing my name.
name: Yoko Ono

quote: When you read a piece of writing that you admire, send a note of thanks to the author.
name: Sherman Alexie

quote: Drink and be thankful to the host! What seems insignificant when you have it, is important when you need it.
name: Franz Grillparzer

quote: He enjoys much who is thankful for little.
name: Thomas Secker

quote: By and large, the gospel of grace is neither proclaimed, understood, nor lived.
name: Brennan Manning

quote: I'm thankful to get the opportunity to direct. I hope I don't mess it up.
name: Mark Harmon

quote: I'm thankful to my family, friends, and fans for all of their support.
name: Serena Williams

quote: Both of my grandfathers were in the service. It's one of those things that you can't be thankful enough for.
name: Luke Combs

quote: Certainly the research shows that grateful people are more innovative thinkers.
name: Deborah Norville

quote: The worst moment for the atheist is when he is really thankful and has nobody to thank.
name: Dante Gabriel Rossetti

quote: I'm just really thankful to have the chance to portray a character you don't see every day.
name: Regina King

quote: Such lovely warmth of thought and delicacy of colour are beyond all praise, and equally beyond all thanks!
name: Marie Corelli

quote: No matter what, our American Army is so big, and we are so very thankful to them.
name: Suga

quote: I'm very thankful to be doing what I'm doing. I feel very blessed.
name: Justin Timberlake

quote: Unseasonable kindness gets no thanks.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: When you solve a problem, you ought to thank God and go on to the next one.
name: Dean Rusk

quote: A great deal of who I am is down to Barca and La Masia - I am very thankful to them.
name: Andres Iniesta

quote: Should it happen tomorrow, I would fall to my knees to give thanks to God for such a career.
name: Placido Domingo

quote: The act is unjustifiable that either begs for a blessing, or, having succeeded gives no thanksgiving.
name: Merle Shain

quote: To be able to make a living doing what I love is truly a gift, and I'm thankful for that every day.
name: Mike McCready

quote: I work hard, and I'm thankful people recognize that.
name: Ander Crenshaw

quote: I've done it all. I'm thankful and proud of what I've accomplished in my life. I hope to keep doing it.
name: Ralph Stanley

quote: I'm thankful that I have lived long enough to become a legend, and I hope I deserve it.
name: Ralph Stanley

quote: I'm one of the most fortunate people in the world.
name: Rose Kennedy

quote: Well, there's not a day goes by when I don't get up and say thank you to somebody.
name: Rod Stewart

quote: Thankfully, we didn't stop at Malta. I think Malta was thankful, too.
name: Spike Milligan

quote: Looking back, I am thankful that I didn't go into the film industry.
name: Hideo Kojima

quote: I found out that superstars Winkler and William Shatner are real people, and I was so thankful for that.
name: Terry Bradshaw

quote: I'm very thankful to the Yankees and to Major League Baseball for allowing me to play this game.
name: Alex Rodriguez

quote: I'm thankful for performing as long as I am allowed.
name: Chuck Berry

quote: I'm thankful that I was able to have a long, healthy career for the most part.
name: Scottie Pippen

quote: I'm thankful to have time to write.
name: Paul Watson

quote: There's no ex out there who I'm not friends with today, and I'm extremely thankful for that.
name: Taylor Lautner

quote: I'm not going to tell you to meditate on what Christmas really means and be thankful.
name: Monica Johnson

quote: Thankfully, while our self-righteousness reaches far, God's grace reaches farther.
name: Tullian Tchividjian

quote: I'm thankful to be here in Cleveland, and I believe this is where I belong.
name: Josh Gordon

quote: I'm so thankful that there are people willing to do that - to actually carry a child nine months for someone.
name: GloZell

quote: But I'm very thankful that no one is slamming my head against the wall anymore.
name: Harry Anderson

quote: I realize how unique my path has been. And I'm thankful for that.
name: Vanessa Paradis

quote: I'm thankful for the three ounce Ziploc bag, so that I have somewhere to put my savings.
name: Paula Poundstone

quote: I'm thankful that my memory is good because my vision is going.
name: Paula Poundstone

quote: I'm just thankful to be blessed with my talent.
name: Ty Dolla Sign

quote: I'm happy and thankful that people are messing with the Dolla $ign.
name: Ty Dolla Sign

quote: I'm just thankful to have a tour and work something I can focus on.
name: Jerry Cantrell

quote: I am thankful, of course, for the prize and thankful to God for each story, each idea, each word, each day.
name: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quote: I was in the postseason twice and I'm thankful for that.
name: Ryne Sandberg

quote: I'm grateful for my brokenness. I'm grateful for my humility.
name: James McGreevey

quote: I learn more with every job, and I'm very thankful for where I am.
name: Liam Hemsworth

quote: I'm thankful for all the support I've received over the years.
name: Big K.R.I.T.

quote: It's important you stay professional and keep working, and I'm thankful for everything that's happened to me.
name: Dele Alli

quote: I wouldn't be where I am without my fans, and I am very thankful for them.
name: Kygo

quote: I am really excited and thankful for opportunity to work with Cotto Promotions, Tidal and Roc Nation.
name: Yandel

quote: I'm very humbled and honored. I'm very thankful to the Asian-American Community for all their support!
name: Jeremy Lin

quote: I'm thankful for not ever taking anything illegal.
name: Pedro Martinez

quote: I'm so thankful for the active obedience of Christ. No hope without it.
name: John Gresham Machen

quote: My music is my No. 1, and I've got people who believe in me and keep me going. I'm thankful.
name: Jon Pardi

quote: Let a nation's fervent thanks make some amends for the toils and sufferings of those who survive.
name: Edward Everett

quote: I am thankful to all the love that I have received from my fans.
name: Shaheer Sheikh

quote: I mean you got to thank your parents for giving you the right genes.
name: Eric Heiden

quote: I'm thankful I am able to continue to share the joy and the inspiration tap brings.
name: Savion Glover

quote: I'm so thankful every day.
name: Yahya Abdul-Mateen II

quote: I have got good films, and I am thankful to Aditya Chopra. He put a lot of faith in me.
name: Anushka Sharma

quote: I feel so thankful that I'm able to be a part of something that I love to wake up and run to work every day.
name: Alexander Wang

quote: They were some of the best years of my life, and I'm so thankful I was able to go to Stanford.
name: Kelley O'Hara

quote: I'm thankful that l I have an amazing family, black women that raised me.
name: LeToya Luckett

quote: I'm just thankful that I continue to do therapy because it makes the world a better place.
name: Farrah Abraham

quote: My work in Africa was paid for mostly by American Christians, and I am so thankful for their giving hearts.
name: Reinhard Bonnke

quote: Vince McMahon made me a much better businessman, and I'm super thankful to him.
name: Diamond Dallas Page

quote: In my case, my mother had to be my mother and father, so I am thankful to her.
name: Henrikh Mkhitaryan

quote: I still don't look at myself as a star. I've always had a thankful heart.
name: Brenda Lee

quote: I'm so thankful that I got to travel from a relatively young age.
name: Abigail Spencer

quote: I am very thankful to Washington, D.C. for their loyalty and support.
name: Raheem DeVaughn

quote: I'm very thankful to Bellator.
name: Tito Ortiz

quote: I just take things one day at a time. I'm just thankful that I have my legs, my arms, my eyes.
name: Fantastic Negrito

quote: I'm so thankful to have been born in the times that we live in.
name: Matt Bomer

quote: I feel very, very thankful to have the family that I do.
name: Matt Bomer

quote: I am thankful that 'Jhalak' made me a professional dancer now from just a 'barat' dancer.
name: Ashish Sharma

quote: My fans are definitely my shareholders, and I'm extremely thankful for them.
name: Jacob Whitesides

quote: I think it's important to say that I am genuinely thankful for the time at Bellator.
name: Eddie Alvarez

quote: And I'm so thankful that I've been allowed to show another side of Trish.
name: Trish Stratus

quote: I'm very thankful; I'm very appreciative for everything that the Denver Broncos organization has done for me.
name: Brock Osweiler

quote: I'm proud - or really more thankful than anything - for all the work that I've gotten.
name: Annie Ilonzeh

quote: I've had bad jobs. Now I have a good one. I'm thankful.
name: Maurice Greene

quote: I am really thankful for my career.
name: Rob Van Dam

quote: I'm actual thankful for the amount of responsibility that has been handed to me. I feel very honored.
name: Samira Wiley

quote: Who wouldn't be thankful for another medal?
name: Tori Bowie

quote: I am thankful I can see much to admire in all religions.
name: Alfred Russel Wallace

quote: I'm really thankful for my improv background.
name: Lauren Lapkus

quote: I'm just thankful for gigs.
name: Tony Hale

quote: I could not be more thankful to those who voted me through and believed in me.
name: Brynn Cartelli

quote: I'm so thankful for my one year at regular high school in White Plains.
name: Jennifer Damiano

quote: I'm thankful to say that I already have my dream job. I wouldn't trade it for anything.
name: Nathan Kress
